resources.string:
"Doc. Bot 

"
"This app is created by ENSIAS students:
" "

" "This chatbot can give treatments for 20 different emergency cases in both english and" " french languages.

" "Treated Emergency cases : 

" "1- abdominal pain
" "2- animal bites
" "3- insect sting
" "4- sunburn
" "5- urine blood
" "6- broken toe
" "7- bruises
" "8- thermal burns
" "9- choking
" "10- cuts
" "11- diarrhea
" "12- dizziness
" "13- food poisoning
" "14- heart palpitations
" "15- heat exhaustion
" "16- heat stroke
" "17- hypothermia
" "18- nosebleeds
" "19- muscle strain
" "20- sprains strains
"
